character.name: Character
character.desc: Must join a unit before game starts.

commander.name: Commander
commander.desc: Up to 3 formations may join when launching an assault.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.desc: Imnune to damage from losing an assault and blast markers when broken. May chose to not withdraw.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrators
infiltrator.desc: Double speed and ignore enemy zones when charging.

inspiring.name: Inspiring
inspiring.desc: +1 to assault result roll for each inspiring unit.

invulnerable-save.name: Invulnerable Save (6+)
invulnerable-save.desc: Additional save of 6+ to each wound received.

jump-packs.name: Jump Packs
jump-packs.desc: Ignore terrain and friendly units while moving.

leader.name: Leader
leader.desc: Remove an extra blast marker when it regroups or rallies.

mounted.name: Mounted
mounted.desc: Counts as a vehicle for movement effects, and as infantry otherwise.

reinforced-armour.name: Reinforced Armour
reinforced-armour.desc: Allows save rolls against MW. Re-roll non-MW save rolls.

skimmer.name: Skimmer
skimmer.desc: Ignore terrain and friendly units while moving. Can pop up over terrain (closer to the skimmer) for shooting (except on sustained fire and marshall actions). May always chose firefight in assault.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.desc: Roll for snipers separately. The attacker may chose which enemy unit is hit. -1 to save throws.

supreme-commander.name: Supreme Commander
supreme-commander.desc: Re-roll initiative once per turn. Remove an extra blast marker when it regroups or rallies. Up to 3 formations may join when launching an assault.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.desc: Place unit in any turn before strategy roll. Roll d6 for each teleporting unit, with a 1 you receive a blast marker.

slow-and-steady.name: Slow and Steady
slow-and-steady.desc: They may not be used on the first two turns.

support-craft.name: Support Craft
support-craft.desc: Ignore terrain and friendly units while moving. Can be seen over terrain (closer to the support craft). Always uses firefight in assault.

self-planetfall.name: Self Planetfall
self-planetfall.desc: Can planetfall even if an enemy spacecraft is present.

expendable.name: Expendable
expendable.desc: A formation does not receive a Blast marker when a unit with expendable is destroyed.

tunneler.name: Expendable
tunneler.desc: Select arrival zone before game and at which turn (opponents half needs turn 3 or more). Place units before strategy roll.
